text:
Hey <@UV23JHEJY> Just seeing this but curious if you were able to figure it out? This <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/workflows/create-workflows#add-actions|is in the knowledge base> but as of now, here is the list of actions you can use the data from the webhook in:

    ◦ Send internal email notification.
    ◦ Create task.
    ◦ Send in app notification.
    ◦ Value equals branch.
    ◦ Set property value (when setting text properties).
    ◦ Copy property.
    ◦ Create record (when setting text properties).
    ◦ Send Slack notification (requires Slack integration).
    ◦ Format data (_*Operation Hub*_ _Professional_ or _Enterprise_ only).
    ◦ Webhook (_*Operation Hub*_ _Professional_ or _Enterprise_ only).

Apologies for the delayed response, just seeing your reply. :sweat_smile: <@U03DU06MZ7Y> Yes as of now it's only contact based but we're currently working on expanding it to other objects pretty soon!
